item.title: On being quiet – and being busy: impact on web analytics and content strategy
item.description: You may not have noticed, but I have - I’ve been quiet, and not been adding any new posts or updates to any of my WordPress plugin.

item.title: Key trends in mobile usage from the UK
item.description: Mobile usage in the UK is on the increase. That's all sounding good so far.

item.title: In the future (avoiding trends) and how to write about it
item.description: when writing about or thinking about the future start by writing these words ‘in the future’ or maybe ‘Wouldn't it be cool, if in the future’.
